function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of innovative technologies like drones and sensors may lead to over-reliance on technology and reduced human oversight, increasing the risk of missing safety hazards.","Impact":"Increased risk of safety hazards going unnoticed, leading to potential accidents or injuries.","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of human oversight and regular training to ensure that technology is used as a complement to, rather than a replacement for, human judgment.","Technologies":"Human oversight training, safety procedures, automated alerts","People":"Inspectors, workers","Owner":"Safety managers, technology implementers"},{"Description":"Failure to clearly define and communicate zones of safety and hazard in the work environment, leading to increased risk of workers entering hazardous areas unintentionally.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of workers being exposed to safety hazards, leading to potential health risks.","Mitigation":"Implement clear signage and training programs to educate workers about the boundaries of safe and hazardous zones, and provide ongoing reinforcement of safety protocols.","Technologies":"Clear signage, educational materials, training programs","People":"Workers, transit agencies","Owner":"Safety managers, transit agencies"},{"Description":"Economic pressures and workload leading to workers being pushed into hazardous work conditions, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.","Impact":"Increased risk of accidents and injuries due to workers operating in hazardous conditions under pressure.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce work-related pressures, such as workload management strategies, and provide support systems for workers to manage stress and maintain a safe working environment.","Technologies":"Workload management systems, stress management tools, support resources","People":"Workers, employers","Owner":"Employers, management"}]}
